snippet.title: Crazy Machines 3 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Crazy Machines 3 will be available at 6 pm (MET) today!

Crazy Machines 3 is the latest, greatest, most amazing and craziest part of the series and fascinates once more with physic-based puzzles. Build your own crazy machines and share your awesomeness across the world thanks to the Steam Workshop.

Crazy Machines 3 is out now on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/351920/

Become a part of the Daedalic Community ... 

http://www.daedalic.de/en
http://www.facebook.com/daedalic
http://www.twitter.com/daedalic
http://daedalicentertainment.tumblr.com/
